span.span: Represents the method that will handle the or event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示一个窗体包含显示一个日历年的控件。The following example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 该示例演示如何设置属性，例如， ， ， ， ，和以自定义日历控件的外观。The example demonstrates setting properties like , , , , , and to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他属性，如， ，和设置为来自定义哪些日期粗体。Other properties like , , and are set to customize which dates are bolded. 该示例还将属性来更改日历格式，包括， ， ，和。The example also sets properties to change the calendar format, including , , , and . 和还处理事件，并在窗体上显示其状态。The and events are also handled and their status displayed on the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar/CPP/monthcalendar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar/CS/monthcalendar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar/VB/monthcalendar.vb#1)]
